name: Rain Jam 2022
description:
Long story short, amazing developers, disastrous planning.

Thanks everyone for a fun jam! Here is our quarter-baked game.

Developers:

  • Alex Meade - Composer/Sound Designer (itch.io)
  • El - Writer/Artist
  • Nyx - Artist
  • Ren - Writer (Twitter)
